text: 'in aladhin yadfaeun alhaqu balbatl, wyrddun alhujaj alsahihat balshshubah alfasdt bila burhan wala hujat min allh, lays fi sudur hwla' 'iilaa tkbr ean alhq; hsdana minhum ealaa alfadl aldhy atah allah nbyh, wakaramat alnubuat alty akrmh bha, wahu 'amr laysuu bmdrkyh wala naylyh, faetsm biallah min shrhm; 'iinah hu alsamie laqwalhm, albasir bafealhm, wsyjazyhm elyha
